website_summaries.verdict: Get high-quality protein and low sugar in a satisfying treat in lots of flavors at a premium price.
pros: More protein and lower sugar per bar compared to others
Lowest carb option on our list
Vegetarian, Paleo, Keto Friendly, Gluten Free and Non-GMO
cons: Pricey but worth it for the serious carb-cutter

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product, NOT keto friendly
customer_reviews.text: VERY bad for blood sugar, and therefore NOT keto. All sugar alcohols are NOT the same, and the more deceptive manufacturers will always use the cheapest one, known as maltitol. How bad is maltitol? So bad, that even artificial sweeteners like sucralose have LESS impact on blood sugar. I am outraged. NEVER buy a bar that uses ANY sugar alcohol other than erythritol. Erythritol is the ONLY sugar alcohol that has nearly ZERO effect on blood sugar, meaning it is true keto. The Atkins snack bars use erythritol. Buy Atkins, do not buy Grenade unless they switch over to erythritol. Grenade bars sent my blood sugar ratings through the roof, and I am NOT diabetic. VERY misleading product
customer_reviews.author: D. Warner

customer_reviews.title: SOOOOOO DELICIOUS!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOMELY DELICIOUS!!! . I shared with all my Zumba and hike trail friends and they loved it!!! I kept raving about how it doesn't have that awful protein taste that lingers on the back of the side tongue, and they all agreed.. also i loved how it was not too sweet like how some protein bars try to cover the "protein taste" by adding so much sugar or even nasty artificial sweeteners. I cant wait to get more flavors and i will be sharing that too!! thanks #GrenadeUSALLC #GrenadeUSA
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: These protein bars are pretty good as far as protein bars go. The cookie pieces are crunchy but the bar overall is sort of chewy. There is still that definite protein powder taste that all bars in this category have but these don't taste like cardboard, which puts them ahead of most others I have tried. I got the white chocolate cookie flavor and it's pretty good. I love that there are 22g of protein, one bar is perfect to replace breakfast or lunch when I don't have time for a proper meal, and I'm left feeling full with energy to make it to the next meal.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Keto Dieters Beware
customer_reviews.text: These taste great. Unfortunately, Maltitol appears fairly high on the ingredient list. Maltitol is a sugar substitute that has been shown to raise blood sugar and increase insulin response. So there's a good chance that these bars are really a candy bar with protein. Too bad, because I was looking for an alternative to Quest bars, which are made with Erythritol, which does not raise blood sugar or insulin.
customer_reviews.author: Fionnbharr

customer_reviews.title: Best low carb bar out there
customer_reviews.text: OMG. I basically live off protein bars, I've tried them all (low carb ones) and these are by far, by FAR, my favorite. Feels like I'm eating a Snickers. They're something I look forward to each day. My only issue with them is the price, this flavor in particular costs way more than their other flavors and costs much more than other brands. If the cost was lowered to what the other bars are going for I'd up my rating to 5 stars without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Squilly

customer_reviews.title: A Matter of Taste
customer_reviews.text: Really expected these to taste good based on reviews here. I am not that picky at all on protein bars, but I will have to 'suck it up' to finish this box of bars. Very strong rasberry flavor. To each his or her own on taste I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: If sugar alcohols don't cause gastro intestinal problems for you, these bars are incredible. They have 11g of sugar alcohol, so having more than one per day wouldn't be a recommendation. However, the taste on these is fantastic, and for the amount of protein you get, you really can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to eat lower carb and I have been amazed by how many carbs many protein bars have in them. I found this bar on Amazon and decided to order based on the reviews. This is DELICIOUS. It tastes remarkably similar to a candy bar, and the texture and chew is so satisfying. Everyone in my household loves these. I have reordered twice after my initial order! These are not the lowest carb bars I have found, but the carbs are doable and the taste is fantasic, so its a win-win for me. I haven't tried other flavors because this one is so good! I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: CranberryKoala

customer_reviews.title: Chalky Flavor with High Fiber
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is super disappointing. It's very thick and chalky. I bought these bars, because they had good reviews online. However, the flavor was really bad. Also, the bars have 7G of fiber each. The Amazon listing does not clearly list the fiber, but for my needs, that amount is way too high for a protein bar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste is AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: These taste awful! I have a whole box in the cabinet wasting. The ONE bars are a million times better tasting than these! I know protein bars are not made to taste like a candy bar, but these were inedible to me.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I have been very disappointed with these bars. A great price, but they taste old. I buy these bars all the time, so I know what they are suppose to taste like and I am very disappointed. I do not like to give bad reviews, but I am very dissatisfied with the taste. If this would be a first time purchase for someone, they probably would not buy again. The expiration on the label of these is April 2020, so even though not out of date, this could be the reason of them tasting old.
customer_reviews.author: cosmo

customer_reviews.title: Things are addictingly good, and won't kill you.
customer_reviews.text: I like protein and fiber. Both are critical to each other. Too much protein without fiber and you get stopped up. These are pretty low calorie for what they are. I like to have a few a day when I want a snack and they do help you to feel very satisfied and full. The flavor is better than most candy bars or sweet snacks, without the huge diet busting sugars. Highly recommend for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Plain and simple. Taste is very poor and uncomfortable to even chew. Lots of bad ingredients, I gained weight with these, so, these are not for the fitness conscious. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul William E.

customer_reviews.title: Believe The Hype.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start of by saying that customer service is on point! Had a little issue with the delivery process (Nothing on their end) and they went out of their way to resolve the issue! The bars taste GREAT absolutely no after taste like most tend to have. Blind smell it, you will guess it’s a snickers bar verry little protein taste if any! The taste is great even though the peanut takes a back seat, the caramel comes in strong, and a slight chocolate flavor. Overall it is really good I would verry much recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SvtSteve

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Support the Praise Found in Reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I will keep it short and simple. These bars are disgusting. Normally my kids will steal my protein bars and I literally couldn't get them to take more than a bite of these.....and my boys eat any and everything. Now I have almost a whole box of overpriced protein bars that I can't even give away. If you want a good protein bar checkout MusclePharm's Combat Crunch or Robert Irvine's bars. Can I get a refund on this garbage?
customer_reviews.author: Danial J. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: These are like crack.
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting low-carb/high protein bar out there, hands down. Only downside is that I ate the whole box in like 2 days. No, seriously. Hopefully the nutrition info is accurate! Note: Amazon is showing "chocolate" for this review. That's not what I got - I got the "White Chocolate Salted Peanut"
customer_reviews.author: J. Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Candy bar with no guilt!
customer_reviews.text: Currently writing this after my first bite. Dang it is good! The person who said it tastes like a raspberry ghirardelli square hit it right on the nose. It's not hard or gritty like other bars I've tried. It's soft and chewy and the raspberry filling is gooey. The packaging is really pretty which doesn't hurt either. Will be trying other flavors from this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: So good! But melted in the mail
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving these 5 stars because the taste is amazing. Arguably one of the best protein bars I’ve ever had. No stomach problems from them like others complained about with these bars. However they arrived totally melted and had to be frozen to salvage what I could. The price would be nice a little lower but it wouldn’t keep me from ordering again. The melting in the mail would...
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly delicious.
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing. They don’t sell them in the stores, at least not that I know of. My job had them in the break room for sale and I fell in love. They almost remind me of three musketeers with their “fluffiness”. Only thing is I wish it cost a little less. But other than that these are delish.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought the peanut butter grenade bars because I loved their hazelnut spread. I thought this would translate to their bars; it didn’t. I made the poor assumption there would be actual peanut butter in it, instead of the powder. There was a really bitter aftertaste to it, which shocked me since I have never had issues with sweeteners before. I am disappointed in this product and regret spending so much money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: They curb my sweet cravings and add extra protein, which I need for my vegetarian diet. Not TOO protein-y tasting (not that chalky, healthy protein bar taste or texture) it is very close to eating a delicious cookie bar. And you get several of them making it worth the money unlike some of the other bars out there that are SO expensive. White chocolate cookie is what I got but I want to try all the flavors now.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Good bars
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy that the box was all broken inside the package and the individual bars where all over the place inside the bag. The shipping took a little longer also. I've tried these before at GNC and like although a bit on the pricey side but definitely calms my sugar cravings. Can't wait to try all these different flavors!
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE ROSAS

customer_reviews.title: These won't dissapoint you!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I are working towards a healthier lifestyle and needed something to get us through those midday snack cravings. Grenade bars are the perfect snack! They feel like a treat but without the guilt, win-win on our end! I love the variety pack because you're not tied down to one choice. They taste great, not super gritty, keeps you full and help kick that sweet tooth! All in all, we will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: My new go to for a quick meal
customer_reviews.text: I'll start off by saying this bar is not for everyone. Anything with protein in it is sure to have some kind of protein taste to it, however these do a good job at making it taste good, at least for me. I came to love these bars but I can see how others wouldn't really enjoy it so much as you can taste the protein. So if you want to go for it then go for it I would recommend starting with either cookies and cream or caramel.
customer_reviews.author: Rosestar

customer_reviews.title: but wish their was a good option of samples so i could have avoided spending ...
customer_reviews.text: Been a big fan of these a lot recently. I've been trying different flavors, but honestly notreally a fan of the cookie dough one at all. not sure i can eat them all, will just have to avoid it in the future, but wish their was a good option of samples so i could have avoided spending almost $30 on a flavor that I don't enjoy much at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good flavor, high protein, lower carbs
customer_reviews.text: For when I am craving dark chocolate and raspberry -- this one has good flavor, high protein and less carbs. Beware about eating more than one a day though -- unless you are wanting a cleansing with cramps.
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like candy without the sugar
customer_reviews.text: These were definitely a risk to take in ordering. I'd seen mixed reviews for them but seemed to hear more positve things anout Caramel Chaos. OH GOOD LORD ITS AMAZING. Tastes like a combination of Kit kat and milky way. HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Capolungo

customer_reviews.title: White chocolate taste great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the white chocolate flavor. I was pleasantly surprised at the taste. They were not too sweet but just sweet enough to have a great flavor. I do low carb and these help me keep my carb count down while still eating something delicious. I do wish they came in variety pack.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce B

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I have eaten quite a few protein bars, including the famous quest bars, before and after the recipe change. These bars taste much better than the rest and keep you feeling energized and full. I do wish they had other flavors. These melt quickly so don't bring it to a picnic or throw in your purse. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Meli

customer_reviews.title: Great low carb bar! (2 Net carbs)
customer_reviews.text: These bars taste surprisingly good and have a really nice, chewy texture (Peanut Butter flavor). 2 Net carbs per bar. I wouldn't say they were super filling, but they work to get me over the hump between lunch and dinner. I'm very happy and will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Best. Protein Bar. Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best tasting best looking protein bar I have ever had. It does have a lot of carbs but it’s good on high carb days. It tastes like a candy bar. It is amazing. I really enjoy the caramel chaos. It is by far the most delicious protein bar I’ve ever had. The caramel is perfect and the taste is amazing. You should definitely try this!
customer_reviews.author: Drew Steadman

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty!
customer_reviews.text: These taste awesome. I’m surprised they are so low in sugar and carbs. I travel a lot and these are great snacks on the plane.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor, great texture.
customer_reviews.text: Does not have the bitter aftertaste some artificially sweetened foods have, or it's covered up by the strong chocolate flavor. Best part is the texture - does not have the 'chew forever' effect some competing products have.
customer_reviews.author: Trelligan

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: I got these based on reviews and a few profession reviews. If you like super-sweet white chocolate type flavor you may like it. I did not. The texture was also far more soft/chewy than I was led to believe. There is no crunch except the annoying sprinkles on the outside that fall off as you eat and get everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: S. France

customer_reviews.title: AVOID THE VARIETY PACK!
customer_reviews.text: It excludes the two best flavors (white chocolate cookie and white chocolate salted peanut) even though they are listed in the description of it, and instead comes with Dark Chocolate Raspberry, which wasn't even listed as an option and tastes horrible. The white chocolate salted peanut, cookie dough, and white chocolate cookie are my favorites. Birthday cake and dark chocolate raspberry have that dry, cardboard-y sort of taste that typical protein bars (like Quest) have.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Nasty
customer_reviews.text: I have had a pretty good selection of tasty protein bars that were low carb but by far these are the natiest things Ive tasted.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful meal replacement for snack for an active keto lifestyle!
customer_reviews.text: I lost a little over 100 pounds almost 3 years ago by following a keto diet. I am always looking for keto friendly products to help me with my new lifestyle and journey. I travel for a living and I am away from home for over 200 nights every year which makes it very hard to maintain a good eating habit. I found these bars first in the UK last year and fell in love with them! They are a great meal replacement, do not hinder my keto state in any way and they taste great! I love these bars!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon McDonald Tate

customer_reviews.title: Bought the variety. No birthday cake.
customer_reviews.text: It has only 4 flavors and none was birthday cake which i was looking forward to. Because it was delivered by amazon, most of them melted in the heat for delivery before I received them. Not sure it tastes like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Mom70s

customer_reviews.title: Really wish I could send back
customer_reviews.text: Tried the white chocolate cookie flavor, not impressed. Awful taste. Really wish I could return these or even test out a different flavor but I now have an opened box after trying one bar and am too disappointed to spend the money on trying a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi Matuska

customer_reviews.title: These Are Great!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these protein bars. The ONLY reason I gave the flavor 4 stars is because the birthday cake one is terrible. Lol. But not terrible enough for a bad rating. Maybe they'll improve it, but over all...this is me and my boyfriend's go to for protein bars. Nothing else really compares.
customer_reviews.author: Sadé Renée

customer_reviews.title: Best Protein Bar on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: I am a protein bar lover with always being on the go. These bars are definitely not only the best tasting but most satisfying protein bar on the market. I do not taste artificial flavoring and the texture is just perfect. I actually look forward to having one every day unlike quest bars or one bars. I prefer the chocolate chip cookie dough but also loved the banana chocolate one (they do not sell the banana flavor in US). Anyways, if you are looking for something else to try and are sick and tired of the quest bars I think you will be pleasantly surprised with this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Taste like sh!t
customer_reviews.text: Taste nasty. I have this box full just wasting away. I literally only ate like a bar and a half since I got it in the mail
customer_reviews.author: qwest_live

customer_reviews.title: Love this bar!
customer_reviews.text: I have been on a hunt for low carb/keto bars and have tried many. I love this bar—particularly this flavor. I have tried a couple of their flavors and in my opinion, this is the best one I have tried so far. Delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Great protein bar
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I love the high protein with low sugar combo, as I am a vegetarian. Also, you get a combination of flavors. I haven’t found a better bar. The calories are also low.
customer_reviews.author: Carol H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST protein bar around, and I’ve tried them all! Just imagine if Twix and Milky Way had a candy bar baby!! So good!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani Hull

customer_reviews.title: Best Keto Bar I've found
customer_reviews.text: These are the best keto friendly protein bars I have found. Great flavor, low net carbs ate between 2-3 depending on the bar. 20-23 grams of protein. Depending on your preference, you will have some favorites. Mine are Caramel Chaos, Dark Chocolate Raspberry, and Chocolate Cream. Although not bad by any means, just not my preferred, Chocolate Crunch, Cookie Dough, and Birthday Cake.
customer_reviews.author: John A.

customer_reviews.title: Nasty, old, disgusting,  not even close to chocolate taste
customer_reviews.text: Most disgusting protein bar I ever tried. The chocolate was just old and nasty like it was in the sun for too long and went bad. Not sure if I just got a bad batch or if all taste this way but I wont spend the money on the chance. It even had a nasty color to it to go with the taste. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Hatley

customer_reviews.title: Great if your not on KETO!
customer_reviews.text: They are very good but I am on keto and they have some ingredients that if on keto not so great? Otherwise I would reccomend them if your not on keto. Sucralose!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Bad Impression
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 different flavors of this brand and one was perfectly in tact while the outer packaging of the other one came completely torn apart, which left a bad impression. Individual bars seem to be fine though. Flavor is good. A little too sweet for my liking, but nonetheless tastes good, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt taste so good it honestly taste like throw up and it was disgusting
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Flavor Town yummy. Except BIRTHDAY CAKE. Tastes like melted wax candles on bday cake.
customer_reviews.text: I got the variety pack. The only flavor I did not like is BIRTHDAY CAKE. It honestly tastes like the wax candles on a birthday cake. The other flavors are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: A filling and wholesome snack
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I can get a high amount of protein in a tasty, wholesome snack.The other nice thing is that the snacks weren’t too sweet, and it took away a lot of the cravings In between meals. I was satisfied with all the flavors, and I wish I could get larger quantities in a box.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence

customer_reviews.title: So good you will doubt they are low carb!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BOMB. Low carb, plus a healthy dose of protein, but it feels like a candy bar. So good! These are definitely part of regular rotation from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: The texture of these were fine, but the flavor and consistency of these were awful, I didn’t like a single bar. All of them tasted very bland
customer_reviews.author: Jamison Martinez

customer_reviews.title: These are actually pretty good for protein bars...
customer_reviews.text: In comparison to other protein bars I've had (and I've had a few) these actually taste good. I mean they're still protein bars, so don't expect taste bud heaven, but you won't dread "having" to eat them because you have to meet some protein requirements or because you don't want to waste your money lol. You might actually enjoy them as a nutritional snack...
customer_reviews.author: amp2017

customer_reviews.title: Grenade Carb Killa
customer_reviews.text: The grenade carb killa white chocolate cookie bars are not too bad, but I dont like the consistency or the artificial flavor. They tastes too artificial to me, not something I will purchase again. It could me that I had just ate when I tried one, but I personally did not like them. They arrived on time, packaging was not damaged so that was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: SarahC26

customer_reviews.title: Badd product
customer_reviews.text: If you don't care about flavor and you don't mind that things don't taste good well done this is your product if you like to in something less like cardboard with a terrible flavor again this is your product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bars, but expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Although these bars taste pretty good and are great for getting in some added protein without the added calories, they are a little too pricey. Also, I wish bars would stay away from using sugar alcohols in their products.
customer_reviews.author: George Nassar

customer_reviews.title: Best Flavor!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite Grenade bar flavor. It reminds me of those Ghirardelli squares in dark chocolate raspberry! I will definitely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Missing White Chocolate Cookie!!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I love these bars - we typically try to eat pretty low carb and these are a great option. Unfortunately, we've been wanting to try the White Chocolate Cookie variation which is listed in the variety-pack. Instead we've been getting Dark Chocolate Raspberry with the variety-pack we ordered. If there's anyway we can correct this it'd be greatly appreciated. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Meg Caccavale

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey for me
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty tasty bars. I just can’t get by paying $30 for 12 bars. I’ll reorder if I ever see them cheaper, but, the way I go through protein bars these would cost me way too much. If you don’t mind the cost, these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Greg B.

customer_reviews.title: Flavor Variety Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was ordering this same variety pack for months when I was in the UK and it always came with 11 total flavors provided in one box (one flavor had two bars); however, since I have been back in the US ordering this pack, it only comes with 6 total flavors (two of one flavor). I still love these bars and they have been my protein bar of choice for a long time now, but I am disappointed because I loved having the wider variety.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Grenade bars great in the past, this order likely sat in 90+ degree warehouse
customer_reviews.text: Received as ordered, opened first bar (see pictures) and it had melted on one end, dried out on the other. Unfortunately I missed the return date by two days. My take this was a package that was stored in very hot conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful taste
customer_reviews.text: They are the best tasting low carb protein bars I have tried. Carmel chaos is excellent. Tastes like the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Angelseakr

customer_reviews.title: These bars were unacceptable.
customer_reviews.text: I buy these bars often and they are one of my favorites. The photo shows what is what a great bar looks like (left) and what the bars look like that I received recently(right). You judge the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Pullen

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These are the yummiest protein bars I’ve ever hand. They’re aren’t overly sweet like sugar alcohols sometimes make things. The best part to me is the texture. These bars are soft and airy and still very filling. I will definitely be buying them again!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: No one like them
customer_reviews.text: Tried them out on my family and no one liked them. They were very hard and flavor not good. Kind of looked slightly melted and maybe stale.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: This Gerenade is not a Bomb! LOL
customer_reviews.text: Great Tasting Macro Balanced Bar! I picked up a few of these bars in an airport and immediately had to order a box! Macros are 37-32-31. For a guy who strives for 40-30-30, it's spot on!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel John

customer_reviews.title: Great for Small meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: Very fulling protein bar, I use them when I'm in a hurry and don't want to miss breakfast. These will hold you over for a small breakfast/Lunch replacement. Pair it with your protein shake after a workout and you'll feel full. Only dislike is a personal one ( this flavor contained caramel which I dislike).
customer_reviews.author: Tony Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Balloon Treat
customer_reviews.text: Taste amazing but causes gas and bloating. Whatever you do DO NOT eat more than one per day.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Deeee-licious
customer_reviews.text: Yummmmmm. I have a crazy sweet tooth and this is like eating straight-up sweets. Keeps me satisfied until my next meal. I always look forward to eating the next one! Absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Got 9 bars instead of 12
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened but I got 9 bars instead of 12 lol. Will try another order when I finish these. Edit: Also seems like the bars look off and packaging seems to be a bit oily. I like these bars but it might be better buying from a local store.
customer_reviews.author: Zero

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious!!! I have been doing keto for two years and I’m so glad I found these! Delicious....
customer_reviews.author: JANINE

customer_reviews.title: Beat bars EVER!
customer_reviews.text: By far THE best bars ever. They taste great, they are filling and don’t give any digestion issues.
customer_reviews.author: D. Plagens

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: These Bars are delicious white chocolate cookie is my favorite they don't have any kind of weird aftertaste and the texture is good I really like them they are low carb and great for a snack or meal on the go
customer_reviews.author: Tilly

customer_reviews.title: most flavors are just ok
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the chocolate raspberry The other flavors all taste the same
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hine

customer_reviews.title: Best Protein Bar
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the most delicious protein bar I have ever had! BUY BUY BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M

customer_reviews.title: The White Chocolate bars are the best. They taste just like a candy bar
customer_reviews.text: The White Chocolate bars are the best. They taste just like a candy bar. I could easily eat two in one sitting but, I like white chocolate. I'm not a fan of dark or even milk chocolate. hence, I maybe biased. But these are fabulous. Better than quest bars. Texture is softer than most protein bars and there is no crazy after taste.
customer_reviews.author: Corley

customer_reviews.title: Using these bars for several years
customer_reviews.text: They are really hard to beat for taste, and the amount of protein they deliver. A lot more "candy bar like" than some others...but man I love em.
customer_reviews.author: reconrover

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but not fresh.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one at a convenient store it was fresh and great. The ones delivered were less great. A little mallard browned.
customer_reviews.author: trent

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Meh. I got two flavors, caramel chaos and ginger bread. They both tasted exactly the same. Texture is nice but in terms of flavor, you’re left asking “what is this?” A disappointment, especially considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hadania Almazyed

customer_reviews.title: Really fake flavor, sugar alcohols
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty gross. I'd rather drink my protein than eat something full of sugar alcohols
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous_

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I normally never write reviews on Amazon, but feel this warrants one. These bars have a nasty stale taste. The bars I received are very tough to chew, as if I’m trying to chew a rock. Not sure if I received a bad batch or the cold weather affected the product in transport, but man these are nasty. I was pretty excited for these after watching youtubers rave about them and also because of the reviews on here. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Love these bars
customer_reviews.text: This is not the first time I have ordered this product and will continue to do so. High-quality, great taste, excellent price point!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Very very good but it makes me want to eat them all the time
customer_reviews.text: Very very good but it makes me want to eat them all the time
customer_reviews.author: Paul chamberlin

customer_reviews.title: Coconut flavored
customer_reviews.text: Coconut is one of the best tasting protein bar ever. Highly suggest
customer_reviews.author: Abayady1

customer_reviews.title: Dry
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as I would have hoped but they do they job
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: So/So
customer_reviews.text: Taste was 2/5 ingredients 4/5 I'd normally recommend Quest bars but they are going downhill so this is a good alternative (with the exception that there aren't multiple flavors)
customer_reviews.author: BTR

customer_reviews.title: Worst bar I've ever tasted
customer_reviews.text: I tried three of these things and couldn't do it. Threw the rest of the box away.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Allen

customer_reviews.title: great bars!!!  Crappy handling!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this product three times. First time was great. We love them. 2nd order has vanished off the face of the earth and 3rd order is completely melted!!! The product isn't the problem its the way it gets shipped or in the 2nd orders case lack of
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Canady

customer_reviews.title: This one is yummy
customer_reviews.text: The white chocolate cookie is my favorite flavor so far. It taste almost like the Hershey's cookies and cream candy. It's not as healthy as my favorite protein bar (raw rev glo creamy peanut butter), but tastier! I'm actually keeping this subscription. I wish it was cheaper. Even with the 15% discount, it's still pretty expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Rotts

customer_reviews.title: These bars are very tasty and the macros are unbeatable ...
customer_reviews.text: These bars are very tasty and the macros are unbeatable. I will definitely be ordering these again. I have not found a bar that was this tasty and has such low carbs/high protein.
customer_reviews.author: Paloma A. Perry

customer_reviews.title: it's like a candy bar
customer_reviews.text: it's like a candy bar with all the nutritional value of a protein bar. .. and it's delicious, no weird flavor like most protein bars.
customer_reviews.author: matrix058

customer_reviews.title: it tasted really bad, it taste like something that went bad
customer_reviews.text: There were something wrong with the bars, it tasted really bad, it taste like something that went bad, I am assuming that it went bad somewhere after shipping it to my country because the reviews are mostly positive regarding the taste, also I know many that recommended it especially this flavor, I guess I wasn't lucky with this product.
customer_reviews.author: M.AJ

customer_reviews.title: Sooo delish!
customer_reviews.text: I swear I have tried every protein bar out there. This is by far, one of the best! Great flavor and texture. Not dry or chalk like. Definitely the best flavor Grenade has come out with
customer_reviews.author: courtney goudreau

customer_reviews.title: strange experience
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure of how this happened, but 3 out of the 12 bars were already opened. I obviously didn't trust eating them but I found this odd! I love Grenade Carb Killa bars, but this is not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: New favorite protein bar flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I love grenade and have been eating their bars for like a year. But the texture ad flavor of this bar is different. It does not have any after taste of artificial sweeteners and is not overly sweet. The texture is also very smooth. I would say it tastes exactly like a dark chocolate raspberry Ghiradelli square.
customer_reviews.author: francesca donofrio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of grenade carb killa bars. I saw this new flavor (chocolate chip cookie dough) and decided to pull the trigger. Boy am I glad I did. This bar tastes great and is like I'm having a candy bar. A PROTEIN PACKED CANDY BAR FROM THE GODS! If Thor were alive, he'd be eating these things while riding a flying unicorn wielding Mjolnir into battle against Fenrir.
customer_reviews.author: OrcJuice

customer_reviews.title: Don't taste very good
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn't sure about this flavor but after having a few it's starting to taste pretty bad and end up throwing half of it away.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Ruckman

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not too tasty
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. But taste more grainy than other protein bars. Won't buy again but they will be good for hiking 😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Grenade Carb Killa High Protein and Low Sugar Candy Bar, 12 x 60 g - Caramel Chaos
product_meta.description: Flavor:Caramel ChaosA triple-layered, delicious, high protein bar. Made with European chocolate and a thick caramel layer, this bar has an unmatched taste! Delivering up to 23 grams of protein per bar, Carb Killa has been designed to provide balanced complete sources of protein, while limiting the level of simple, processed refined sugars. The perfect chocolate bar alternative and guilt-free treat! Warnings: Allergens: Milk, Soy. Manufactured in a facility that also processes gluten, tree nuts, peanuts, wheat and eggs.
feature_bullets: CARAMEL CHAOS: A thick caramel layer covers this protein bar and crispy crunchies give Grenade’s Caramel Chaos the perfect texture! A triple-layered, high protein bar that is the perfect guilt-free snack! Go ahead, and indulge, our Carb Killa bars will keep you on track with your health and fitness goals

EUROPEAN CHOCOLATE: Our bars will not only keep your body energized, they’ll satisfy your sweet tooth! Carb Killa bars go through a specialty baking process giving them the ultimate texture and making them extra soft. After baking, each and every bar is dipped in European chocolate for the perfect finish

HIGH PROTEIN SNACK: Carb Killa bars are packed with everything you need to keep your body fueled. Each and every bar is high protein and high fiber. Informed sport approved, our Carb Killa bars contain less than 1 GRAM OF SUGAR AND AT LEAST 20 GRAMS OF PROTEIN. No matter your lifestyle, our bars will keep you at your best!

LOW SUGAR HIGH ENERGY: Carb Killa bars are designed with versatility and modern diets in mind. Our bars are packed with protein and ready to be enjoyed by anyone and everyone! Our products are GMO Free and contain sustainable Palm Oil

GRENADE IS ON YOUR SIDE: Here at Grenade, we’re all about hard work and commitment! From day one, we have continued to pride ourselves on making each product and formulation as unique as possible to go beyond the seen-it-all-before sports nutrition stereotypes. We want to inspire people to get more out of life, whatever their goals

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
